channel.title: Archiving on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Archiving on Arrans github.io

item.title: paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx
item.description: A community-supported supercharged document management system: scan, index and archive all your documents

item.title: Dacid99/Eonvelope
item.description: Preserve your emails with this open-source self-hostable email archive! This repository is just a mirror, please go to the gitlab repo at https://gitlab.com/Dacid99/eonvelope to contribute code.

item.title: blob42/gosuki
item.description: A lightweight, open-source, privacy-first bookmark manager that unifies your bookmarks across multiple browsers, syncs them in real time (locally or P2P), requires no extensions, and stores everything locally.
